name: DynamoAI
description: Linear Algebra and Machine Learning algorithms for Dynamo. For more information on how to use, you may visit http://design-intent.blogspot.com. Please feel free to leave your feedback on this package and the posts.
contents: LinearRegressionGradientDescent - For a given initial theta it computes modified theta based on the Gradient descent algorithm for a given input matrix(training data) and corresponding expected output vector., LinearRegressionModel - Creates a linear regression model, NormalizeForGradientDescent - Parses the given matrix for input and output data and then normalizes the input matrix. Returns input matrix, output vector and the normalization function, PredictLinearRegression - Predicts a value using linear regression model, ReadTrainingData - Reads CSV Data from the given file path and normalizes it to output training matrix and expected output vector
